page.title: 07Darlington Cigarette Maker
page.content:
My dad works 2 shifts at {Rothman's Cigarette Factory. }One week he works from 6 am until 2 pm. The other week he works from 2 pm until 10 pm. The factory is very big. My dad operates a packing machine which means he packs the cigarettes into boxes ready to be sold in the shops. They also export the cigarettes to different parts of the world such as the Middle East, Belgium, Norway and cyprus. My dad is machine operator but he started off as an intermediate.
My dad sometimes packs the cigarettes into{camel packs}which the Arabs take across the deserts strapped to camels. They sometimes smuggle these over the border. There are about 900 workers in my dad's factory. {Melanie Hardy }
